events.message: I received the wrong size in my recent order and would like to request a refund for the item, please.
The customer's message indicates a refund request due to receiving the wrong size item.
Assigning case to agent Emily for refund processing and customer communication.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to assist you with your refund request for the wrong size item.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the received item so we can verify the issue quickly?
Sure, my order number is 987654321 and attached is a picture showing the size tag on the product I received.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund to your original payment method and send you a prepaid label to return the incorrect item.
That sounds good, thanks for resolving this quickly. I appreciate the help and look forward to the refund.
We have initiated your refund and emailed you the return shipping label. Please send the item back at your earliest convenience.
Just checking in to confirm you have returned the item and received the refund. Please let us know if you need further help.
Since your refund has been completed successfully, we will now close this case. Feel free to contact us anytime.
